file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug440.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug440.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug440.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)

file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug440b.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_440_SON/bug440.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug440.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug440.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_440_SON/bug440.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_440_SON/bug440.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;measure;bug440")
endif()
